hostConnection.title: Check Connection
hostConnection.description:
This page checks if this website is accessible from the internet.

There are three prerequisites for a website to be accessible from the internet:

  • The DNS server must be available
  • The returned IP address must be correct
  • The server's content must be accessible

If one of the prerequisites above fails, this website may not be accessible from the internet.
hostConnection.dnsOffContent: This website does not have a name server. It maybe externally configured.
hostConnection.dnsManagedContent: This website's DNS is managed by {0}.
hostConnection.dnsMixedContent:
This website's DNS has a mixed
            configuration. Ensure that the name server
            is configured properly. Do not mix our
            records with other records!
hostConnection.dnsExternalContent: This website's DNS is handled by a third party.
hostConnection.pingNoIpContent: The DNS server does not return an IP address.
hostConnection.pingNoIp6Content: This website's DNS has no IPv6 address. It maybe unavailable for IPv6 users.
hostConnection.pingWrongIpContent:
This website's DNS returned an incorrect IP address. 
            It may not serve the correct content, or it's behind a proxy.
hostConnection.pingNoWwwTitle: www.* subdomain IP address not found
hostConnection.pingNoWwwContent:
Some people may not be able to access this
            website if they prefix it with www. Setup a
            www subdomain redirect is recommended.
hostConnection.pingOkContent: This website's DNS returned the correct IP address.
hostConnection.webNoHttpContent: This website is not accessible via HTTP.
hostConnection.webNoHttpsContent:
This website may not have HTTPS certificate
            installed, or it's expired, or not configured properly.
hostConnection.webBadHttpContent:
This website returns 500 or 403 error, 
            it may not be configured properly (check NGINX/App settings!).
hostConnection.webBadRedirectContent:
This website is redirecting visitors to outside the domain, 
            it may not be configured properly (check Base URL settings!).
hostConnection.webBadWwwContent: This website's www subdomain is either not accessible or returning error.
hostConnection.webInsecureContent:
This website doesn't redirect HTTP to HTTPS,
            which is fine but not recommended.
hostConnection.webOkContent: This website is accessible via HTTP and HTTPS.

hostFirewall.title: Check Firewall
hostFirewall.description:
Firewall helps your website not to be exploited in the event of a hacker break-in by blocking all outgoing traffic except those on the whitelist.

Depending on your use of the website, you may want to turn off the firewall if your website requires third party API or other forms of communication not listed in the whitelist.

The firewall applies to the domain and all subdomains within. It is mandatorily turned on for users with free plan. To turn it off, you have to be in subscribing plan (Lite or above).

Read more
hostFirewall.offContent: All outgoing traffic is allowed. Keep your site secure, please!
hostFirewall.onContent:
All third-party outgoing connection is blocked except for whitelists.
Turn it off to remove this limitation.

hostNginx.title: Check NGINX Config
hostNginx.description:
NGINX is our main server gateway that serves HTTP ports (80 and 443). To make your website works, your web app must be correctly configured here. Here you can view your current configuration and make changes either via preconfigured UI or full-blown NGINX config as YAML script.

NGINX typically serves static content first that's configured via root path, or forward the request dynamically to your App via PHP-FPM fastcgi or Passenger passenger if such file doesn't exist.

NGINX config is different for subdomains. If your subdomain content happens to live inside this website, please enter the subdomain name below to configure it. Also, please take a moment to read our NGINX Configuration or contact us in case you came into a problem.
hostNginx.errorFetch: There was an error fetching the NGINX config

hints.root: Static files from {0} will be resolved to {1}

staticModes.smart: Attempt to find HTML file if possible
staticModes.index: Serve root index.html if no file found
staticModes.autoindex: Allow listing server files if index.html is not found

phpModes.default: Serve index.php or php files that ends with .php
phpModes.smart: Attempt to find PHP file without .php
phpModes.indexSafe: Serve root index.php but don't try if client looks for a file
phpModes.index: Serve root index.php when static file is not found
phpModes.always: Allow PATH_INFO style requests handled to PHP

hints.deleteSubfolderPrompt: Are you sure want to delete subfolder config for {0}
hints.inputSubfolderPrompt: Please input subfolder (must start with '/' and no spaces)
hints.inputSubfolderNotUnique: Subfolder value must unique with other subfolder entries

hostDNS.title: Check DNS Config
hostDNS.description:
This page helps you change DNS records if you point your domain name server to us.

Alternatively, you can also edit DNS records via Webmin.
hostDNS.errorFetch: There was an error fetching the dns config

hostLog.logTypeAccessHint: This log contains NGINX access logs for the current day
hostLog.logTypePassengerHint: This log contains Passenger App log that's currently running
hostLog.errorFetch: There was an error fetching the log file
hostLog.emptyLog: This log is empty right now

hostManage.title: Manage Website Access
hostManage.description: Use the following login access to upload or edit your website content. Learn more.
hostManage.openPortsDescription: Opened Ports for editing your server
hostManage.webminInfo:
Webmin is used to manage your server files and configurations using web interface.

You'll be autologged in.
hostManage.filestashInfo:
Filestash is used to manage your server files using web-interface of SFTP connection. (to upload files, use drag-and-drop).

You'll be autologged in.
hostManage.phpMyAdminInfo:
phpMyAdmin is used to manage MySQL database using web interface.

You need to enter credentials manually.
hostManage.phpPgAdminInfo:
phpPgAdmin is used to manage PostgreSQL database using web interface.

You need to enter credentials manually.
hostManage.websshInfo:
WebSSH is used to open SSH connection using web interface.

You'll be autologged in.
hostManage.vscodeInfo:
Open VS Code to edit files and run commands directly on your server.
Make sure you already have installed VS Code and its Remote SSH Extension.

If you want to open another folder, enter here and press return:

hostTransfer.warn: ATTENTION! Website transfer means moving it to another account. You will lose access to your data because the owner has changed!
hostTransfer.hint: Please enter the email of the account you wish to receive:
hostTransfer.disabled: You cannot transfer this website while it's not active.

hostDelete.warn: ATTENTION! Host deletions are permanent and we can't reverse the action. Please be certain.
hostDelete.hint: Please enter your website username to agree to host deletion.

hostCname.disabled: You cannot change the domain name when this website is not active.
hostCname.hint: You can change the main domain name website here. Enter the new domain name:
hostCname.warn: This will make your website unusable for current domain! Please update DNS in new domain beforehand for minimal downtime.
hostCname.member: Members cannot change the domain of this website.

hostRename.disabled: You cannot change the username when this website is not active.
hostRename.hint: You can change your website username here. Enter the new username:
hostRename.warn: This will also change database username! Your website may be unusable until you change it in your website config.
hostRename.member: Members cannot change the username of this website.

hostPasswd.disabled: You cannot change the password when this website is not active.
hostPasswd.hint: You can change your website password here. Enter the new password:
hostPasswd.warn: This will also change database password! Your website may be unusable until you change it in your website config.
hostPasswd.member: Members cannot change the password this website.

hostCheck.title: Mandatory DNS Checkup
hostCheck.prompt: This checks whether {0} can be resolved via Google's DNS before get added into our server.
hostCheck.valid_with_note: This domain will be resolvable once additional configs added automatically for you
hostCheck.incorrect: Incorrect A+AAAA/CNAME record to this domain, please configure it first before continue.
hostCheck.missing: Missing A+AAAA/CNAME record to this domain, please configure it first before continue.

domain.createInfo: Keep in mind you are only registering a domain. If you want to manage the website, create the website here
domain.transferInfo:
Make sure that you have access rights to transfer the
            domain from another service. We will reach out to you if the
            domain transfer fails after payment, but if you fail to
            prove domain ownership through the EPP code or existing
            document requirements, we cannot help you. By ToS you will
            not get a refund in the purchase of a domain under any
            circumstances.
domain.eppTransferInfo:
You can transfer your domain to another registrar by
            using this EPP code. The transfer works if the domain is not locked
